high_descs: Turn to your left and walk along the bed, to the head of the bed.
Pick up the round, brown and white pillow between the book and the cell phone, on the bed.
Turn around and walk to the wall, then turn right and go to the left side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp in the back right corner of the desk.
Turn left and move to the head of the bed under the window.
Pick up the round purple pillow from the bed.
Turn around and move to the desk on your right.
anns.task_desc: Examine the round pillow by the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the left and move to the end of the bed. Face the bed on the right.
Pick up the pillow from the left side of the bed.
Hold the pillow and turn to the right and then turn right to face the desk.
Hold the pillow and turn on the lamp that is on the left side of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Hold a pillow and turn on a lamp.
